entries.title: Matthew Modine Talks Stanley Kubrick, Trump and Why He’ll be Voting for Kamala Harris
entries.summary: Matthew Modine, who famously portrayed Private Joker in Stanley Kubrick’s Vietnam War classic Full Metal Jacket, spent months working with the director and became a close friend. Even back then, like Kubrick, he had clear views on war and peace. Today, those views are stronger than ever. “If Stanley were alive today, with the state […]

entries.title: Joe Rogan Says Free Speech in Danger If Kamala Harris Elected President
entries.summary: Joe Rogan thinks a Kamala Harris presidency would spell doom for free speech in America ... he says Harris and Tim Walz would have the feds increasing censorship online. Joe warned a possible Harris administration would "clamp down more" on online…
